entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
